The '''Dilapidated Old House''' is an event [[Domain]] encountered during the [[Bantan Sango Case Files: The Warrior Dog]] event.

It is marked under the [[File:Icon Dilapidated Old House.svg|25x25px]] map icon.

===Abilities and Attacks===
''Attack names are unofficial except for Canine Art: Geo Bunshin and Canine Art: Plummeting Blade.''

*'''Slash:''' When in melee range, charges and slashes once with its sword, dealing {{Color|Physical DMG}}.
*'''Slash Combo:''' Performs consecutive slashes with its sword, dealing {{Color|Physical DMG}}.
**'''Combo 1:''' Performs a horizontal and upwards slash at the player, before performing a flurry of slashes around itself.
**'''Combo 2:''' Charges at the player while continuously slashing, before performing a spinning slash.
*'''Canine Art: Plummeting Blade:''' Teleports to the player's location and marks an area around it, calling down thunder and dealing {{Color|AoE Electro DMG}} in the marked area shortly after.
*'''Canine Art: Geo Bunshin:''' Teleports away and leaves a {{Color|Geo}} Bunshin Bomb at its original location that marks an area around it before detonating, dealing {{Color|AoE Pyro DMG}} in the marked area. This attack is also used to recover from the stunned state.
*'''Thunderwheels:''' Launches three spinning wheels in different directions, dealing {{Color|Electro DMG}} on hit. This attack is only used as a follow-up to '''Canine Art: Geo Bunshin'''.
*'''Thunderblades:''' Launches three vertical blades at the player, dealing {{Color|Electro DMG}} on hit.

===Strategy===
Upon receiving a certain amount of [[Interruption Resistance|poise]] damage, Kageroumaru will be temporarily stunned, which may be used to the player's advantage.
